content.en: Ultrasound image enhancement: Researchers have developed various algorithms to reduce speckle noise in ultrasound images and improve image quality. These algorithms utilize techniques such as maximum likelihood estimation, anisotropic diffusion, wavelet modulation, Gabor filters, homogeneity filters, nonlocal means filters, and adaptive filtering. By incorporating these algorithms, speckle noise can be effectively reduced while preserving important features and enhancing image details in ultrasound images.
content.da: Forbedring af ultralydsbilleder: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at reducere speckle-støj i ultralydsbilleder og forbedre billedkvaliteten. Disse algoritmer anvender teknikker som sandsynlighedsmaksimering, anisotropisk diffusion, bølgemodulation, Gabor-filtre, homogenitetsfiltre, ikke-lokale midler-filtre og adaptiv filtrering. Ved at inkorporere disse algoritmer kan speckle-støj effektivt reduceres, samtidig med at vigtige træk bevares og billeddetaljer i ultralydsbilleder forbedres.
